note.p: Birth: The Manor House, Paddington, Middlesex, England (11 January 1790)
Death: At his residence, 62 Pembridge Villas, Notting Hill Gate, London (20 November 1874)

Career: 2nd Lieutenant (1805); Lieutenant-Colonel (1830); Knight of the Royal Hanoverian Guelphic order (1831); Inspector General of Railways (1840); MP for Chatham (1857-1868); Colonel (1860); Major General (1863)
